title: Trying to Identify this Font.
content:
I tried Identifont and Whatthefont, but no results. Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414020155im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Mechanic_3925..jpg)

Thank you in advance for the help!
author: Alotta Signs

comments.content:
I trust you will get a good answer if you post your request at the Font Identification forum [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414020155/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
Look forward to seeing you there.  
Don
